front.title: Mapping non-URIs to contact element in Presence Information Data Format

abstract.t: The Presence Information Data Format (PIDF) defines a basic XML format for presence information. The contact element in PIDF is understood as a URI. However, some existing Internet services do not identify users (presentities) natively with a URI. Mapping non-URIs to contact element in Presence Information Data Format (Map2PIDF) specifies the mapping of addresses to a URI in the case of such currently existing services.
